text: The Betsafe Cup was a summer football friendly tournament played twice in 2014 and 2015. In 2014 only two teams participated in the competition, which was hosted by German club FC Ingolstadt 04, who played against 1. FC Köln (Germany). The second edition in 2015 took place in Austria with four teams: 1.
